attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2016-0029

Date: 2016-01-26

The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, advises that the Honourable Jody Wilson-Raybould be appointed one of Her Majesty’s Counsel learned in the law and that a Commission be issued to her.


Sur recommandation du premier ministre, le Comité du Conseil privé recommande que l’honorable Jody Wilson-Raybould soit nommée conseillère juridique de Sa Majesté et qu’une commission lui soit délivrée à cet effet.
